body_html: I think it would be nice to figure out what's causing the actual failure at the cuda level, but it's surprising to me that this code is being reached at all -- I think that's the bug. Basically, we need to figure out why "GPUMachineManager()" is ever being called when no GPU devices are requested -- that's the entry point that tries to do GPU initilization. I'll try to find time to debug this.
body_text: I think it would be nice to figure out what's causing the actual failure at the cuda level, but it's surprising to me that this code is being reached at all -- I think that's the bug. body: I think it would be nice to figure out what's causing the actual failure at the cuda level, but it's surprising to me that this code is being reached at all -- I think that's the bug.  Basically, we need to figure out why "GPUMachineManager()" is ever being called when no GPU devices are requested -- that's the entry point that tries to do GPU initilization.  I'll try to find time to debug this.
